hwEponMIB.name: hwEponMIB

revisions.description: V1.21, changes in this revision: - Modify the node hwEponnniPasswordChangeTrap name to hwEponnniAuthChangeTrap.
V1.20, changes in this revision: - Delete unnecessary en dashes.
V1.19, changes in this revision: - Modify the value range of the leaf node hwEponNniKeyLoid and hwEponNniKeyCheckCode.

V1.18, changes in this revision: - Modify the enum values of the leaf node hwEponnniOpticsModuleSubType and hwEponnniOpticsModuleType for obtaining optical-module information. - Add leaf node hwEponnniOpticsModuleType, hwEponnniOpticsModuleSubType, hwEponnniOpticsModuleUsedType, hwEponnniOpticsModuleEncapsulationType in table hwEponnniCfgTable for obtaining optical-module information.
V1.15, changes in this revision: - Add leaf node hwEponnniClearThreshold in table hwEponNniAlarmThresholdTable for clear optical-module threshold.
V1.14, changes in this revision: Modify the definition of the trap node: hwEponnniPasswordChangeTrap for trap optimization.
V1.13, changes in this revision: Modify chinese character and module name.

V1.12, changes in this revision: Add hwEponnniOntRogueOntFailAlarmTrap for sending trap when EPON ONU's optical-module always send laser. Add hwEponnniOntRogueOntRestoreAlarmTrap for sending trap when EPON ONU's optical module always send laser alarm recovery. Add hwEponnniTempeExceedThreAlarmTrap for sending trap when the temperature of EPON ONU's optical-module exceeded alarm threshold. Add hwEponnniTempeExceedThreRestoreAlarmTrap for sending trap when the temperature of EPON ONU's optical-module exceeded alarm threshold recovery. Add hwEponnniVoltExceedThreAlarmTrap for sending trap when the voltage of EPON ONU's optical-module exceeded alarm threshold. Add hwEponnniVoltExceedThreRestoreAlarmTrap for sending trap when the voltage of EPON ONU's optical-module exceeded alarm threshold recovery. Add hwEponnniBiasExceedThreAlarmTrap for sending trap when the bias electrical current of EPON ONU's optical-module exceeded alarm threshold. Add hwEponnniBiasExceedThreRestoreAlarmTrap for sending trap when The bias electric current of EPON ONU's optical-module exceeded alarm threshold recovery. Add hwEponnniTxPowerExceedThreAlarmTrap for sending trap when the tx-power of EPON ONU's optical-module exceeded alarm threshold. Add hwEponnniTxPowerExceedThreRestoreRestoreAlarmTrap for sending trap when the tx-power of EPON ONU's optical-module exceeded alarm threshold recovery. Add hwEponnniRxPowerExceedThreAlarmTrap for sending trap when the rx-power of EPON ONU's optical-module exceeded alarm threshold. Add hwEponnniRxPowerExceedThreRestoreAlarmTrap for sending trap when the rx-power of EPON ONU's optical-module exceeded alarm threshold recovery. Add hwEponnniPortSwitchAlarmTrap for sending trap when protection switchover occurs on the PON port.
V1.11, changes in this revision: Modify hwEponnniTypeDPortSwitchTrap.

V1.10, changes in this revision: Add leaf nodes hwEponniRxUnicastFrames, hwEponniRxMulticastFrames, hwEponniRxBroadcastFrames, hwEponniRx64BytesFrames, hwEponniRx65to127BytesFrames, hwEponniRx128to255BytesFrames, hwEponniRx256to511BytesFrames, hwEponniRx512to1023BytesFrames, hwEponniRx1024to1518BytesFrames, hwEponniRxOver1518BytesFrames, hwEponniRxUndersizeFrames, hwEponniRxOversizeFrames , hwEponniRxCrcErrorFrames, hwEponniRxDiscardedFrames, hwEponniTxUnicastFrames,hwEponniTxMulticastFrames, hwEponniTxBroadcastFrames, hwEponniTx64BytesFrames, hwEponniTx65to127BytesFrames, hwEponniTx128to255BytesFrames, hwEponniTx256to511BytesFrames, hwEponniTx512to1023BytesFrames, hwEponniTx1024to1518BytesFrames, hwEponniTxOver1518BytesFrames and hwEponnniPonRxErrFramesCnt in table hwEponnniStatisticsTable for getting statistics information. Add leaf nodes hwEponnniTxPowerUpperThreshold, hwEponnniTxPowerLowerThreshold, hwEponnniBiasUpperThreshold, hwEponnniBiasLowerThreshold, hwEponnniTemperatureUpperThreshold, hwEponnniTemperatureLowerThreshold, hwEponnniVoltageUpperThreshold and hwEponnniVoltageLowerThreshold for setting or obtaining optical module alarm threshold.

V1.09, changes in this revision: Add hwEponnniTypeDPortSwitchTrap for sending trap when protection switchover occurs on the PON port. Add hwEponnniXponModeSwitchResultTrap for sending trap when xpon mode switch.

V1.08, changes in this revision: Add leaf nodes hwEponnniUniTxOkOctetsCnt and hwEponnniUniRxOkOctetsCnt in table hwEponnniStatisticsTable for getting statistics information. Add leaf nodes hwEponnniOnuRogueOntState, hwEponnniActiveStatus, hwEponNniKeyLoid and hwEponNniKeyCheckCode for setting or obtaining EPON NNI information.
V1.06, changes in this revision: Add leaf node hwEponnniPassword in table for setting password.

V1.03, changes in this revision: Add table hwEponnniAlarmThresholdTable for setting or obtaining optical module alarm threshold Add table hwEponNniHistoryStatsTable for obtaining history statistics information. Add leaf nodes hwEponnniTrafficBroadcast, hwEponnniTrafficMulticast, hwEponnniTrafficUnknowncast hwEponnniTxPower, hwEponnniRxPower, hwEponnniTemperature, hwEponnniBiasCurrent and hwEponnniVoltage in table hwEponnniCfgTable for setting or obtaining EPON NNI information.

hwEponMIB.contactinfo: Huawei Industrial Base Bantian, Longgang Shenzhen 518129 People's Republic of China Website: http://www.huawei.com Email: support@huawei.com
hwEponMIB.description: The MIB is used for defining Huawei's EPON NNI management MIB objects.

hwEponnniLOSTrap.name: hwEponnniLOSTrap
hwEponnniLOSTrap.description: This trap is sent when LOS(Loss of Signal) EPON NNI line happened.

hwEponnniUnRegisterTrap.name: hwEponnniUnRegisterTrap
hwEponnniUnRegisterTrap.description: This trap is sent when unregistered event of EPON NNI happened.

hwEponnniCfgTable.name: hwEponnniCfgTable
hwEponnniCfgTable.description: The table Eponnni config the EPON NNI, include manage EPON NNI, EPON NNI status information and inquire chipset. The index of this table is ifIndex.

hwEponnniCfgEntry.name: hwEponnniCfgEntry
hwEponnniCfgEntry.description: The table Eponnni config the EPON NNI, include manage EPON NNI, EPON NNI status information and inquire chipset. The index of this entry is ifIndex.

hwEponnniMgntLaserMode.name: hwEponnniMgntLaserMode
hwEponnniMgntLaserMode.description: Describes the laser mode, Options: 1. auto(0) - EPON NNI laser auto 2. off(1) - EPON NNI laser off 3. on(2) - EPON NNI laser on

hwEponnniSubboardReset.name: hwEponnniSubboardReset
hwEponnniSubboardReset.description: Reset the sub board of EPON. Options: 1. reset(1) - Reset the sub board

hwEponnniLinkStatus.name: hwEponnniLinkStatus
hwEponnniLinkStatus.description: Describes the port link status, Options: 1. linkDown(1) - Can't receive optic signal 2. linkUp(2) - Received optic signal

hwEponnniRegStatus.name: hwEponnniRegStatus
hwEponnniRegStatus.description: Describes the port register status, Options: 1. registered(1) - The port is authenticated successfully 2. unregistered(2) - The port fails to be authenticated

hwEponnniTxSpeed.name: hwEponnniTxSpeed
hwEponnniTxSpeed.description: The port up stream speed. Unit:Mbps

hwEponnniRxSpeed.name: hwEponnniRxSpeed
hwEponnniRxSpeed.description: The port down stream speed. Unit:Mbps

hwEponnniMac.name: hwEponnniMac
hwEponnniMac.description: The MAC address of EPON chipset.

hwEponnniHardwareVer.name: hwEponnniHardwareVer
hwEponnniHardwareVer.description: The hardware version of EPON chipset.

hwEponnniFirmwareVer.name: hwEponnniFirmwareVer
hwEponnniFirmwareVer.description: The firmware version of EPON chipset.

hwEponnniOamVer.name: hwEponnniOamVer
hwEponnniOamVer.description: The OAM version of EPON chipset.

hwEponnniTrafficBroadcast.name: hwEponnniTrafficBroadcast
hwEponnniTrafficBroadcast.description: Traffic Broadcast of Eponnni Port,0 is off, 13 is complete. Traffic suppression ID definition: NO. Min bandwidth(kbps) Max bandwidth(kbps) Package number(pps) 1 6 145 12 2 12 291 24 3 24 582 48 4 48 1153 95 5 97 2319 191 6 195 4639 382 7 390 9265 763 8 781 18531 1526 9 1562 37063 3052 10 3125 74126 6104 11 6249 148241 12207 12 12499 296483 24414 13 0 0 0

hwEponnniTrafficMulticast.name: hwEponnniTrafficMulticast
hwEponnniTrafficMulticast.description: Traffic Multicast of Eponnni Port,0 is off, 13 is complete. Traffic suppression ID definition: NO. Min bandwidth(kbps) Max bandwidth(kbps) Package number(pps) 1 6 145 12 2 12 291 24 3 24 582 48 4 48 1153 95 5 97 2319 191 6 195 4639 382 7 390 9265 763 8 781 18531 1526 9 1562 37063 3052 10 3125 74126 6104 11 6249 148241 12207 12 12499 296483 24414 13 0 0 0

hwEponnniTrafficUnknowncast.name: hwEponnniTrafficUnknowncast
hwEponnniTrafficUnknowncast.description: Traffic unicast of Eponnni Port,0 is off, 13 is complete. Traffic suppression ID definition: NO. Min bandwidth(kbps) Max bandwidth(kbps) Package number(pps) 1 6 145 12 2 12 291 24 3 24 582 48 4 48 1153 95 5 97 2319 191 6 195 4639 382 7 390 9265 763 8 781 18531 1526 9 1562 37063 3052 10 3125 74126 6104 11 6249 148241 12207 12 12499 296483 24414 13 0 0 0

hwEponnniTxPower.name: hwEponnniTxPower
hwEponnniTxPower.description: The MDU TX power. It ranges from -10000 to 10000 units of 1/100 dBm.

hwEponnniRxPower.name: hwEponnniRxPower
hwEponnniRxPower.description: The MDU RX power. It ranges from -10000 to 10000 units of 1/100 dBm.

hwEponnniTemperature.name: hwEponnniTemperature
hwEponnniTemperature.description: The MDU Temperature. It ranges from -10000 to 10000 units of 1/100 C.

hwEponnniBiasCurrent.name: hwEponnniBiasCurrent
hwEponnniBiasCurrent.description: The MDU Laser Bias Electricity. It ranges from -10000 to 10000 units of 1/100 mA.

hwEponnniVoltage.name: hwEponnniVoltage
hwEponnniVoltage.description: The MDU Voltage. It ranges from -10000 to 10000 units of 1/100 mV.

hwEponnniPassword.name: hwEponnniPassword
hwEponnniPassword.description: The password of the EPON ONU.

hwEponnniOnuRogueOntState.name: hwEponnniOnuRogueOntState
hwEponnniOnuRogueOntState.description: Indicates whether the optical port is shut down due to the continuous mode(rogue ONT). Options: 1. yes(1) - Port is shut down due to the continuous mode 2. no(2) - Port is not shut down due to the continuous mode

hwEponnniActiveStatus.name: hwEponnniActiveStatus
hwEponnniActiveStatus.description: Describes the EPONNNI port TYPED protect state. Options: 1. active(1) - Active state 2. standby(2) - Standby state

hwEponNniKeyLoid.name: hwEponNniKeyLoid
hwEponNniKeyLoid.description: The loid of the EPON ONU.

hwEponNniKeyCheckCode.name: hwEponNniKeyCheckCode
hwEponNniKeyCheckCode.description: The checkcode of the EPON ONU.

hwEponnniOpticsModuleType.name: hwEponnniOpticsModuleType
hwEponnniOpticsModuleType.description: This object indicates the type of the optical transceiver. Options: 1. unknown(1) - Unknow 2. gpon(2) - GPON 3. epon(3) - EPON 4. epon10g(4) - 10G EPON 5. gpon10g(5) - 10G GPON 6. wdmpon(6) - WDM PON 7. hybridpon(7)- Hybrid PON 8. gponepon(8) - GPON and EPON 9. invalid(-1) - Indicates that the query fails or no information is detected

hwEponnniOpticsModuleSubType.name: hwEponnniOpticsModuleSubType
hwEponnniOpticsModuleSubType.description: This object indicates the sub type of the optical transceiver. Options: 1.unknown(1) - Unknow 2.classbplus(101) - CLASS B+ 3.classcplus(102) - CLASS C+ 4.classb(103) - CLASS B 5.px20(201) - PX20 6.px20plus(202) - PX20+ 7.pr30(301) - PR30 8.pr20(302) - PR20 9.prx30(303) - PRX30 10.prx20(304) - PRX20 11.classbplusandpx20plus(701)- CLASS B+ and PX20+ 12.invalid(-1) - Indicates that the query fails or no information is detected

hwEponnniOpticsModuleUsedType.name: hwEponnniOpticsModuleUsedType
hwEponnniOpticsModuleUsedType.description: This object indicates the application scenario of the optical transceiver. Options: 1.unknown(1) - Unknow 2.olt(2) - OLT 3.ont(3) - ONT, This enumeration is obsolete. 4.onu(4) - ONU 5.invalid(-1) - Indicates that the query fails or no information is detected

hwEponnniOpticsModuleEncapsulationType.name: hwEponnniOpticsModuleEncapsulationType
hwEponnniOpticsModuleEncapsulationType.description: This object indicates the encapsulation information about the optical transceiver. Options: 1. unknown(1) - Unknown 2. sff2x5(2) - SFF 2x5 3. sff2x10(3) - SFF 2x10 4. sfp(4) - SFP 5. xfp(5) - XFP 6. lxfp(6) - LXFP 7. bosaonboard(7)- BOSA ON BOARD 8. invalid(-1) - Indicates that the query fails or no information is detected

hwEponnniStatisticsTable.name: hwEponnniStatisticsTable
hwEponnniStatisticsTable.description: This table is used to query the statistics of the EPON port. The index of this table is ifIndex.

hwEponnniStatisticsEntry.name: hwEponnniStatisticsEntry
hwEponnniStatisticsEntry.description: This table is used to query the statistics of the EPON port. The index of this entry is ifIndex.

hwEponnniPonTxFramesCnt.name: hwEponnniPonTxFramesCnt
hwEponnniPonTxFramesCnt.description: The PON port send OK frames.

hwEponnniPonRxFECErrFramesCnt.name: hwEponnniPonRxFECErrFramesCnt
hwEponnniPonRxFECErrFramesCnt.description: The PON received FEC error frames.

hwEponnniPonRxHECErrFramesCnt.name: hwEponnniPonRxHECErrFramesCnt
hwEponnniPonRxHECErrFramesCnt.description: The PON received HEC error frames.

hwEponnniPonTxPQDropFramesCnt.name: hwEponnniPonTxPQDropFramesCnt
hwEponnniPonTxPQDropFramesCnt.description: The PON send PQ drop frames.

hwEponnniUniRxFECErrFramesCnt.name: hwEponnniUniRxFECErrFramesCnt
hwEponnniUniRxFECErrFramesCnt.description: The UNI received FEC error frames.

hwEponnniUniTxPQDropFramesCnt.name: hwEponnniUniTxPQDropFramesCnt
hwEponnniUniTxPQDropFramesCnt.description: The UNI send PQ drop frames.

hwEponnniStatisticsClear.name: hwEponnniStatisticsClear
hwEponnniStatisticsClear.description: Clear the statistics of EPON NNI, Options: 1. resetStat(1) - Clear the statistics

hwEponniRx64BytesFrames.name: hwEponniRx64BytesFrames
hwEponniRx64BytesFrames.description: The PON received frames of 64 bytes.

hwEponniRx65to127BytesFrames.name: hwEponniRx65to127BytesFrames
hwEponniRx65to127BytesFrames.description: The PON received frames of 65~127 bytes.

hwEponniRx128to255BytesFrames.name: hwEponniRx128to255BytesFrames
hwEponniRx128to255BytesFrames.description: The PON received frames of 128~255 bytes.

hwEponniRx256to511BytesFrames.name: hwEponniRx256to511BytesFrames
hwEponniRx256to511BytesFrames.description: The PON received frames of 256~511 bytes.

hwEponniRx512to1023BytesFrames.name: hwEponniRx512to1023BytesFrames
hwEponniRx512to1023BytesFrames.description: The PON received frames of 512~1023 bytes.

hwEponniRx1024to1518BytesFrames.name: hwEponniRx1024to1518BytesFrames
hwEponniRx1024to1518BytesFrames.description: The PON received frames of 1024~1518 bytes.

hwEponniRxOver1518BytesFrames.name: hwEponniRxOver1518BytesFrames
hwEponniRxOver1518BytesFrames.description: The PON received frames of over 1518 bytes.

hwEponniRxUndersizeFrames.name: hwEponniRxUndersizeFrames
hwEponniRxUndersizeFrames.description: The PON received under size frames.

hwEponniRxOversizeFrames.name: hwEponniRxOversizeFrames
hwEponniRxOversizeFrames.description: The PON received over size frames.

hwEponniRxCrcErrorFrames.name: hwEponniRxCrcErrorFrames
hwEponniRxCrcErrorFrames.description: The PON received crc error frames.

hwEponniTx64BytesFrames.name: hwEponniTx64BytesFrames
hwEponniTx64BytesFrames.description: The PON send frames of 64 bytes.

hwEponniTx65to127BytesFrames.name: hwEponniTx65to127BytesFrames
hwEponniTx65to127BytesFrames.description: The PON send frames of 65~127 bytes.

hwEponniTx128to255BytesFrames.name: hwEponniTx128to255BytesFrames
hwEponniTx128to255BytesFrames.description: The PON send frames of 128~255 bytes.

hwEponniTx256to511BytesFrames.name: hwEponniTx256to511BytesFrames
hwEponniTx256to511BytesFrames.description: The PON send frames of 256~511 bytes.

hwEponniTx512to1023BytesFrames.name: hwEponniTx512to1023BytesFrames
hwEponniTx512to1023BytesFrames.description: The PON send frames of 512~1023 bytes.

hwEponniTx1024to1518BytesFrames.name: hwEponniTx1024to1518BytesFrames
hwEponniTx1024to1518BytesFrames.description: The PON send frames of 1024~1518 bytes.

hwEponniTxOver1518BytesFrames.name: hwEponniTxOver1518BytesFrames
hwEponniTxOver1518BytesFrames.description: The PON send frames of over 1518 bytes.

hwEponNniHistoryStatsTable.name: hwEponNniHistoryStatsTable
hwEponNniHistoryStatsTable.description: This table provides the performance statistics of the EPON port: current 24-hour performance statistics, history 30 24-hour performance statistics, current 15-minute performance statistics, and history 96 15-minute performance statistics. The indexes of this table are ifIndex, hwEponStatsIntervalType, hwEponStatsIntervalNum.

hwEponNniHistoryStatsEntry.name: hwEponNniHistoryStatsEntry
hwEponNniHistoryStatsEntry.description: This table provides the performance statistics of the EPON port: current 24-hour performance statistics, history 30 24-hour performance statistics, current 15-minute performance statistics, and history 96 15-minute performance statistics. The indexes of this entry are ifIndex, hwEponStatsIntervalType, hwEponStatsIntervalNum.

hwEponStatsIntervalType.name: hwEponStatsIntervalType
hwEponStatsIntervalType.description: Describes the type of EponNni History Statistic, Options: 1. intervaltime15min(0) - The EponNNI History Statistic in 15 minutes 2. intervaltime24h(1) - The EponNNI History Statistic in 24 hours 3. everbefore(2) - All the EponNNI History Statistic

hwEponStatsIntervalNum.name: hwEponStatsIntervalNum
hwEponStatsIntervalNum.description: The interval number of EponNni History Statistic. When IntervalType is 15 minutes, IntervalNum is 0 - 96. When IntervalType is 24 hours, IntervalNum is 0 - 30. 0 indicates the statistics in the current interval. The greater the value, the longer the duration. When hwEponStatsIntervalType is everbefore(3), this leaf object is skipped.

hwTimeElapsed.name: hwTimeElapsed
hwTimeElapsed.description: Indicates the data statistic seconds in this period. This leaf object is valid when IntervalNum is 0 (namely, the current 15 minutes and the current 24 hours).

hwValidInterval.name: hwValidInterval
hwValidInterval.description: Whether the interval number is valid.

hwEponnniAlarmThresholdTable.name: hwEponnniAlarmThresholdTable
hwEponnniAlarmThresholdTable.description: The table EponNni optical module alarm threshold.This table is used to set and query the low alarm threshold, the high alarm threshold of eponnni. The index of this table is ifIndex.

hwEponnniAlarmThresholdEntry.name: hwEponnniAlarmThresholdEntry
hwEponnniAlarmThresholdEntry.description: The table EponNni optical module alarm threshold. This table is used to set and query the low alarm threshold, the high alarm threshold of eponnni. The index of this entry is ifIndex.

hwEponnniRxPowerUpperThreshold.name: hwEponnniRxPowerUpperThreshold
hwEponnniRxPowerUpperThreshold.description: The MDU Rx-power upper limit threshold. It ranges from -9900 to 10000 units of 1/100 dBm.

hwEponnniRxPowerLowerThreshold.name: hwEponnniRxPowerLowerThreshold
hwEponnniRxPowerLowerThreshold.description: The MDU Rx-power lower limit threshold. It ranges from -9900 to 10000 units of 1/100 dBm.

hwEponnniTxPowerUpperThreshold.name: hwEponnniTxPowerUpperThreshold
hwEponnniTxPowerUpperThreshold.description: The MDU Tx-power upper limit threshold. It ranges from -9900 to 10000 units of 1/100 dBm.

hwEponnniTxPowerLowerThreshold.name: hwEponnniTxPowerLowerThreshold
hwEponnniTxPowerLowerThreshold.description: The MDU Tx-power lower limit threshold. It ranges from -9900 to 10000 units of 1/100 dBm.

hwEponnniBiasUpperThreshold.name: hwEponnniBiasUpperThreshold
hwEponnniBiasUpperThreshold.description: The MDU Bias upper limit threshold. It ranges from 0 to 10000 units of mA.

hwEponnniBiasLowerThreshold.name: hwEponnniBiasLowerThreshold
hwEponnniBiasLowerThreshold.description: The MDU Bias lower limit threshold. It ranges from 0 to 10000 units of mA.

hwEponnniTemperatureUpperThreshold.name: hwEponnniTemperatureUpperThreshold
hwEponnniTemperatureUpperThreshold.description: The MDU Temperature upper limit threshold. It ranges from -9900 to 30000 units of 1/100 C.

hwEponnniTemperatureLowerThreshold.name: hwEponnniTemperatureLowerThreshold
hwEponnniTemperatureLowerThreshold.description: The MDU Temperature lower limit threshold. It ranges from -9900 to 30000 units of 1/100 C.

hwEponnniVoltageUpperThreshold.name: hwEponnniVoltageUpperThreshold
hwEponnniVoltageUpperThreshold.description: The MDU Voltage upper limit threshold. It ranges from 0 to 10000 units of 1/100 V.

hwEponnniVoltageLowerThreshold.name: hwEponnniVoltageLowerThreshold
hwEponnniVoltageLowerThreshold.description: The MDU Voltage lower limit threshold. It ranges from 0 to 10000 units of 1/100 V.

hwEponnniClearThreshold.name: hwEponnniClearThreshold
hwEponnniClearThreshold.description: Clear the MDU threshold. Options: 1. invalid(0) - The MDU threshold clear state is invalid. 2. clear(1) - Clear the MDU threshold. 3. cleared(32767) - The MDU threshold is cleared.

hwEponnniTypeDPortSwitchTrap.name: hwEponnniTypeDPortSwitchTrap
hwEponnniTypeDPortSwitchTrap.description: TypeD port switch trap. The first ifIndex is the active one after switching over. The second ifIndex is the standby one after switching over. The hwEponnniTypeDPortSwitchTrap will be sent when typeD port switch.

hwEponnniAuthChangeTrap.name: hwEponnniAuthChangeTrap
hwEponnniAuthChangeTrap.description: The hwEponnniAuthChangeTrap will be sent when the authentication information changes.

hwEponnniOntRogueOntFailAlarmTrap.name: hwEponnniOntRogueOntFailAlarmTrap
hwEponnniOntRogueOntFailAlarmTrap.description: Rogue ONT fail trap. EPON ONU was identified as rogue ONU, because it gave out light in the incorrect time. The notification indicates alarm when optical module has been turn off for service of ONU failed.

hwEponnniOntRogueOntRestoreAlarmTrap.name: hwEponnniOntRogueOntRestoreAlarmTrap
hwEponnniOntRogueOntRestoreAlarmTrap.description: EPON ONU's optical module send laser recovery trap. The notification indicates alarm when EPON ONU's optical module sent laser recovery.

hwEponnniTempeExceedThreAlarmTrap.name: hwEponnniTempeExceedThreAlarmTrap
hwEponnniTempeExceedThreAlarmTrap.description: The temperature of EPON optical module exceeded threshold trap. The notification indicates alarm when the temperature of EPON optical module exceeded alarm threshold.

hwEponnniTempeExceedThreRestoreAlarmTrap.name: hwEponnniTempeExceedThreRestoreAlarmTrap
hwEponnniTempeExceedThreRestoreAlarmTrap.description: The temperature of EPON optical module exceeded threshold recovery trap. The notification indicates alarm when the temperature of EPON optical module exceeded alarm threshold recovery.

hwEponnniVoltExceedThreAlarmTrap.name: hwEponnniVoltExceedThreAlarmTrap
hwEponnniVoltExceedThreAlarmTrap.description: The voltage of EPON ONU's optical-module exceeded alarm threshold trap. The notification indicates alarm when voltage of EPON ONU's optical-module exceeded alarm threshold.

hwEponnniVoltExceedThreRestoreAlarmTrap.name: hwEponnniVoltExceedThreRestoreAlarmTrap
hwEponnniVoltExceedThreRestoreAlarmTrap.description: The voltage of EPON ONU's optical-module exceeded alarm threshold recovery trap. The notification indicates alarm when voltage of EPON ONU's optical-module exceeded alarm threshold recovery.

hwEponnniBiasExceedThreAlarmTrap.name: hwEponnniBiasExceedThreAlarmTrap
hwEponnniBiasExceedThreAlarmTrap.description: The bias of EPON ONU's optical module exceeded alarm threshold trap. The notification indicates alarm when the bias of EPON ONU's optical module exceeded alarm threshold.

hwEponnniBiasExceedThreRestoreAlarmTrap.name: hwEponnniBiasExceedThreRestoreAlarmTrap
hwEponnniBiasExceedThreRestoreAlarmTrap.description: The bias of EPON ONU's optical module exceeded alarm threshold recovery trap. The notification indicates alarm when the bias of EPON ONU's optical module exceeded alarm threshold recovery.

hwEponnniTxPowerExceedThreAlarmTrap.name: hwEponnniTxPowerExceedThreAlarmTrap
hwEponnniTxPowerExceedThreAlarmTrap.description: The tx-power of EPON ONU's optical module exceeded alarm threshold trap. The notification indicates alarm when the Tx Power of EPON ONU's optical module exceeded alarm threshold.

hwEponnniTxPowerExceedThreRestoreRestore.name: hwEponnniTxPowerExceedThreRestoreRestoreAlarmTrap
hwEponnniTxPowerExceedThreRestoreRestore.description: The tx-power of EPON ONU's optical module exceeded alarm threshold recovery trap. The notification indicates alarm when the tx-power of EPON ONU's optical module exceeded alarm threshold recovery.

hwEponnniRxPowerExceedThreAlarmTrap.name: hwEponnniRxPowerExceedThreAlarmTrap
hwEponnniRxPowerExceedThreAlarmTrap.description: The rx-power of EPON ONU's optical-module exceeded alarm threshold trap. The notification indicates alarm when the rx-power of EPON ONU's optical-module exceeded alarm threshold.

hwEponnniRxPowerExceedThreRestoreAlarmTr.name: hwEponnniRxPowerExceedThreRestoreAlarmTrap
hwEponnniRxPowerExceedThreRestoreAlarmTr.description: The rx-power of EPON ONU's optical-module exceeded alarm threshold recovery trap. The notification indicates alarm when the rx-power of EPON ONU's optical-module exceeded alarm threshold recovery.

hwEponnniPortSwitchAlarmTrap.name: hwEponnniPortSwitchAlarmTrap
hwEponnniPortSwitchAlarmTrap.description: Port switch trap. The notification indicates alarm when the protection switchover occurs on the PON port and it has no effect on the service.
